title: PBE Signup Error 500?
body: I've been trying to join the PBE for months, periodically checking the website to see if I can enter, but it will always give me an error 500. At one point I was able to join the website using a VPN and sent an application, however now the VPN isn't resolving error 505. I've also tried different browsers and computers but nothing is working. Any ideas?

replies.body: This is an issue we've been looking into, and VPN has been a solid workaround.  If the VPN isn't working and clearing your [cache and cookies](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) isn't working, there isn't much else we can do until the issue is resolved.  My suggestion would be to keep tinkering around with VPN for now.  Hang tight!
